channel.title: Why should you host with Linux?
channel.description:
Hello people of moparscape these are my reasons for hosting my server on a Linux server (CentOS)
Reason 1: IPtables firewall, its a great firewall I can block those server nullers and flooders etc no java code required its all done through the OS Firewall
Reason 2: Linux VPS's / Dedicated servers are cheaper than Windows because Windows servers require a license for each server and use more resources.
Reason 3: Linux has better networking then Windows this is a true fact.
There are more reasons but those are why I chose Linux
